name: SEBA S3LL
description:
The first game I've ever made. You are a ball, get through the levels as fast as you can.

There is no jump, but you are quite bouncy. There is a boost that will help your horizontal speed, but vertical movement may be a challenge.

Original Soundtrack made by me. One song that changes its volume based on your speed. A secret second song. Check it out on soundcloud: soundcloud.com/ses3

There are 2 secrets. Can you find them? Probably not lol.

If you found a way to skip parts of a level, it was probably left in intentionally.

My fastest time is 9177 frames.

Added a windowed version for smaller screens, only use it if the fullscreen version was cut off on your monitor or you cant run it fullscreen for some reason.
